sentences.en: A monument to him was erected in St Paul's Cathedral.
sentences.cn: 在圣保罗大教堂为他修了一座纪念碑。

sentences.en: a view of Rheims Cathedral, in all its splendour
sentences.cn: 尽显其宏伟气象的兰斯大教堂景色

sentences.en: As Wren's epitaph famously declares, the cathedral itself is his monument.
sentences.cn: 众所周知，雷恩的墓志铭中写道，大教堂本身就是他的纪念碑。

sentences.en: His funeral will be on Thursday at Blackburn Cathedral.
sentences.cn: 他的葬礼将于星期四在布莱克本大教堂举行。

sentences.en: Notre-Dame Cathedral in Senlis is less famous than its namesake in Paris.
sentences.cn: 桑利斯的圣母院不如在巴黎与其同名的圣母院有名。

sentences.en: Rosie gray is the one and only person , if it had not been for her , this crystal cathedral would not be here.
sentences.cn: 她就是那一位，唯一的一人若没有她，水晶宫大教堂不会存在，这事工永远不会展开。

sentences.en: St. Patrick's Cathedral is famed for its midnight mass on Christmas eve.
sentences.cn: 圣巴特里克大教堂以其圣诞前夜的午夜弥撒著称.

sentences.en: the baroque frontage of Milan Cathedral
sentences.cn: 米兰大教堂巴罗克风格的正面

sentences.en: The bells of the cathedral rang out their loud peal.
sentences.cn: 大教堂响起了响亮的钟声.

sentences.en: The cathedral is the crowning glory of the city.
sentences.cn: 大教堂是这座城市至高无上的骄傲。

sentences.en: The cathedral was destroyed by the Great Fire of 1136 AD.
sentences.cn: 大教堂在公元1136年的大火中被付之一炬。

sentences.en: The ceiling of the cathedral glittered with gold.
sentences.cn: 大教堂的天花板金光闪闪。

sentences.en: the dome of St Paul's Cathedral
The fourteenth century cathedral was reduced to a mass of rubble.
sentences.cn: 这座14世纪的大教堂变成了一堆瓦砾。

sentences.en: The restaurant is located near the cathedral.
The sheer size of the cathedral is a constant reminder of the power of religion.
sentences.cn: 大教堂的宏大规模使人时刻领略到宗教的威严。

sentences.en: This Gothic cathedral has attracted visitors from all around the world .
sentences.cn: 这座哥特式的大教堂吸引了世界各地的游客。

trans.tran_en: the main church of a particular area under the control of a  bishop
